prompt:
Navigate to this FINN.no job search results page and extract ALL job listings visible on the page. If there's a 'Last inn flere' (Load more) button at the bottom, click it to load more jobs and extract those as well. Repeat loading more until no more jobs can be loaded or you've scrolled 5 times.

For EACH job listing card/item on the page, extract:
1. Job title (exact text from the listing)
2. Company name
3. Location (city/region shown)
4. Full URL to the job posting (complete link, not relative)
5. Short description or summary if visible on the card
6. Posted date if shown (e.g. '2 dager siden', 'I dag', etc.)
7. FINNKODE if visible (job ID number)

IMPORTANT: Make sure to get the COMPLETE URL for each job posting - it should start with https://www.finn.no/job/fulltime/ad.html or similar.

Return the data as a JSON array named 'jobs' with each job as an object containing these fields.

jobs.description: List of all job postings found on the search results page

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Job title as shown on the listing card

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: Full URL to job posting (must be complete URL starting with https://)

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Short job description or summary visible on card

attributes.name: posted_date
attributes.description: When the job was posted (e.g. '2 dager siden')

error_code_mapping.NO_JOBS_FOUND: No job listings found on the page
error_code_mapping.LOAD_MORE_FAILED: Failed to load additional job listings
error_code_mapping.EXTRACTION_FAILED: Failed to extract job data from page
